attributes.action: Stop the increase of UK’s nuclear warheads, instead show the way by reducing.
attributes.additional_details: How can we possibly try to convince other nations to not follow this route if we are taking silly (and potentially illegal) decisions like this. And how was the government seriously convinced that nearly 200 warheads, each capable of utterly destroying a large city, was not a credible threat! Absolute lunacy.
attributes.background: Reverse the decision to increase the UK’s nuclear warhead stockpile and instead show leadership in the right direction by reducing the number.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Dispose of the UK's Nuclear Warheads and encourage other nations to do the same: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574779

Don’t increase the cap on the UK’s stockpile of Nuclear Weapons: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579991
